name: it's not a good day to die
name_original: it's not a good day to die
description:
dedicated to my aging dog, Dexter the dachshund <3

six players

I wrote a song for myself a while back, called it's not a good day to die. 

I wrote the simple lyrics with a funny tone to try and cheer myself up when I was feeling down. I wanted to channel that same energy in this card game, by filling it with cute illustrations and a high social value for friends to laugh and be creative.

I hope you enjoy playing and remember, it's not a good day to die.

Playingcards.io link: https://playingcards.io/2tfjvp
